news.title: Why Tesla Stock Jumped 38% in November
news.content: After an underwhelming year, Tesla ( NASDAQ: TSLA ) stock soared last month, boosted by hopes that Trump's victory would help the electric vehicle ( EV ) maker, as CEO Elon Musk has made himself a close ally to president-elect Trump, spending heavily to aid his campaign before the election.As a ...

news.title: 3 Stocks Flashing Bullish Momentum: SOFI, TSLA, PLTR
news.content: Momentum investing is all about riding bullish trends where buyers are in control. And that's precisely what we've seen with Tesla, SoFi, and Palantir as of late.
